brainly_data.question: How do institutions like religion and politics play a role in creating or maintaining beliefs and preconceived notions
brainly_data.subject: Health

all_answers.question: How do institutions like religion and politics play a role in creating or maintaining beliefs and preconceived notions
all_answers.subject: Health
all_answers.text: The relation between the religion and politics continue to be important despite the need for the separation of the church and state. Religion plays a role as it make claims on people's allegiance and making these claims on all people rather than a specific community. Politics on the other hand also influences the belief of people as exercising their right to choose for political leaders.
